document.masterDocTitle: The sciarid fauna of the British Isles (Diptera: Sciaridae), including descriptions of six new species

subSubSection.paragraph:

Ecological notes : very common in broad-leaved woodland; also found in mixed woodland; conifer plantations; wooded lake margin; reed beds; grounds of horticultural research station; calcareous grassland; parkland, wet meadow; open montane habitats. Reared from the fungus
Stereum sanguinolentum
and nests of robin and dunnock. ivâ€“xi.
